data.name: Preset Message 1
data.message: “I’m no one. I don’t want to be anyone. All I care about is completing the moon’s eye plan. This world is completely worthless. There is nothing left in it but misery.”

data.name: Preset Message 2
data.message: “In the ninja world, those who don’t follow the rules are trash. But, those who abandon their friends are even worse than trash.”

data.name: Preset Message 3
data.message: “The moment people come to know love, they run the risk of carrying hate.”

data.name: Preset Message 4
data.message: “I get it now. I’m in hell.”

data.name: Preset Message 5
data.message: “Look at me! There is nothing in my heart! I don’t feel pain any longer.”
